siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Balanced building
frontmatter.description: If a project is made to do something for others, make sure to get feedback along the way. It's hard to build in a silo, particularly if it's meant for others.
